author: hairong
msg: HADOOP-3511. Namenode should not restore the root's quota if the quota was not saved in the image. Contributed by Hairong Kuang.

author: etnu
msg: Implemented ContentType.FEED, satisfying both SHINDIG-60 and SHINDIG-339. This is based loosely on Gary Helmling's patch.

author: shv
msg: HADOOP-3491. Name-node shutdown causes InterruptedException in ResolutionMonitor. Contributed by Lohit Vijayarenu.

author: shv
msg: HADOOP-3509. Fix NPE in FSNamesystem.close. Contributed by Tsz Wo (Nicholas), SZE.

author: shv
msg: HADOOP-3489. Fix NPE in SafeModeMonitor. Contributed by Lohit Vijayarenu.
